Package gr.interamerican.bo2.utils.meta.ext.formatters

Class Summary
CachedEntryFormatter<T extends TypedSelectable<C>,C extends Comparable<? super C>> Formatter for cached entries.
CachedEntryOwnerFormatter<T extends TranslatableEntryOwner<C,?,?>,C extends Comparable<? super C>> Formatter for cached entry owners.
MoneyFormatter Formatter for Money.
MultiFormatter MultiFormatter delegates formatting to another Formatter based on the type of the object being formatted.
NamedFormatter Formatter for named objects.
PoKeyFormatter This Formatter will use the string representation of a PersistentObject's key as its string representation.
ShortFormatter This Formatter will use the string representation of a PersistentObject's key as its string representation.
TranslatableEntryFormatter<L> Formatter implementation for TranslatableEntry.
TranslatableEntryOwnerFormatter<L> Formatter implementation for TranslatableEntryOwner.
TypedSelectableFormatter Formatter for TypedSelectable objects.
